body.p: Born in Glasgow, Kentucky, in 1812. Married Margaret A. Rogers c. 1834. Father of J. B. McFerran. Hotel Keeper in Munfordville, Bowling Green, and Camelion Springs, Kentucky. Stock breeder in Bowling Green. Owned a livery and sale stable in Nashville, Tennessee in 1860. Owned McFerran & Menefee, commission merchants and cotton factors, in partnewship with J. B. McFerran and Richard J. Menefee.
